title: How to Create a Ringtone With Nokia Composer on the Cell Phone Itself

steps.title: Access the composer application on the cell phone.
steps.content: Access the composer application on the cell phone. This step varies depending on the cell phone model in use. For series 32: Select menu on the left. Select extra from the list of icons that appears. Select composer from the list of icons that appears.

steps.title: Select an empty ringtone to fill in from the list of available empty ring tones.
steps.content: Select an empty ringtone to fill in from the list of available empty ring tones. The maximum memory for a ringtone is up to 50 tones including the musical spaces .

steps.title: Use the cell phone's numeric keypad to enter the tones.
steps.content: Use the cell phone's numeric keypad to enter the tones. Press 1 if you want to enter Do . Press 2 if you want to enter Re . Press 3 if you want to enter Mi . Press 4 if you want to enter Fa . Press 5 if you want to enter Sol . Press 6 if you want to enter La . Press 7 if you want to enter Si . Press 0 to enter a musical space .

steps.title: If you want to change the octave for a tone (composer actually supports up to 3 octaves):
steps.content: If you want to change the octave for a tone ( composer actually supports up to 3 octaves ): Put the cursor immediately after the tone whose octave you want to change. Press the asterisk * key once, to change the octave for the current tone.

steps.title: If you want to make the current tone sharp (applicable for Do, Re, Fa, Sol, La only):
steps.content: If you want to make the current tone sharp (applicable for Do, Re, Fa, Sol, La only): Select the tone. Press the bottom-right sharp key.

steps.title: If you want to change the length of a particular tone or musical space:
steps.content: If you want to change the length of a particular tone or musical space: Select the tone or musical space. Press 8 once, to decrease the duration, or press 9 once to increase the duration.

steps.title: Adjust the parameters of each tone to make the perfect song.
steps.content: Adjust the parameters of each tone to make the perfect song. Save when you're finished.
